description: NVIDIA has release two fresh driver updates for Linux this week. There's a new stable driver, and an update to the Beta series.
title: NVIDIA release 550.90.07 stable and 555.52.04 Beta drivers for Linux

description: Airships: Lost Flotilla is steadily building up to be one of my favourites in the auto-shooter bullet-heaven survivor genre. Now there's an expanded demo and I've got a special code for you.
title: Steampunk auto-shooter Airships: Lost Flotilla demo expanded - get an exclusive airship

description: Certainly an interesting selection of games included in Humble Choice for June, so here's what's in it and what compatibility to expect.
title: Humble Choice for June has Risk of Rain 2, LEGO 2K Drive, Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector and more

description: Critical Wit recently revealed AI Confidential, a game where you take on the role of a RoboTechnician employed by AI megacorp where you'll be fixing up all sorts of strange robots as you fix up broken parts to broken hearts.
title: From broken parts to broken hearts - mend robots in AI Confidential

description: Critical Wit recently revealed AI Confidential, a game where you take on the role of a RoboTechnician employed by AI megacorp where you'll be fixing up all sorts of strange robots as you fix up broken parts to broken hearts.
title: From from broken parts to broken hearts - mend robots in AI Confidential

description: Deep Rock Galactic is by far, one of the best co-op games ever made. Ghost Ship Games are truly showing others how it's done with this upcoming season too.
title: Deep Rock Galactic has a huge new season coming, and you can replay old seasons

description: Tiny Glade from Pounce Light arrives later this year and there's now a demo available. It's worth checking out, if you like games to fully relax with that have no actual goals.
title: Tiny Glade is a gorgeous castle-doodling game that's real clever to relax with

description: A new release of the community-made compatibility layer GE-Proton version 9-6 is here, although nothing too exciting this time as it's pulling in upstream Proton changes from Valve.
title: GE-Proton 9-6 brings various upstream changes from Valve's Proton

description: Returning for the fourth year the Queer Games Bundle 2024 has landed with various video games, physical games, game assets and more.
title: The Queer Games Bundle returns for 2024
